title: Pass
description: Apple Wallet pass with localizations, NFC and web service push updates support.

w3cDate.title: ISO 8601 Date
w3cDate.description: An ISO 8601 formatted date represented as a JSON string.

currencyAmount.title: Currency Amount
currencyAmount.description: An ISO 4217 currency code and an amount.

personNameComponents.title: Person Name Components
personNameComponents.description: An object that manages the separate parts of a person's name

namePrefix.title: Name Prefix
namePrefix.description: The portion of a name’s full form of address that precedes the name itself.

givenName.title: Given Name
givenName.description: Name bestowed upon an individual to differentiate them from other members of a group that share a family name.

middleName.title: Middle Name
middleName.description: Secondary name bestowed upon an individual to differentiate them from others that have the same given name.

familyName.title: Family Name
familyName.description: Name bestowed upon an individual to denote membership in a group or family.

nameSuffix.title: Name Suffix
nameSuffix.description: The portion of a name’s full form of address that follows the name itself.

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.description: Name substituted for the purposes of familiarity.

phoneticRepresentation.title: Phonetic Representation
phoneticRepresentation.description: The phonetic representation name components of the receiver.

field.title: Field
field.description: Keys that define an individual field.

attributedValue.title: Attributed Value
attributedValue.description:
Attributed value of the field.
The value may contain HTML markup for links. Only the <a> tag and its href attribute are supported. This key’s value overrides the text specified by the value key.
Available in iOS 7.0.

changeMessage.title: Change Message
changeMessage.description:
Format string for the alert text that is displayed when the pass is updated. The format string must contain the escape %@, which is replaced with the field’s new value. If you don’t specify a change message, the user isn’t notified when the field changes.
Localizable.

dataDetectorTypes.title: Data Detector Types
dataDetectorTypes.description: Data detectors that are applied to the field’s value. Provide an empty array to use no data detectors. Data detectors are applied only to back fields.

key.title: Key
key.description: The key must be unique within the scope of the entire pass.

label.title: Label
label.description:
Label text for the field.
Localizable.

textAlignment.title: Text Alignment
textAlignment.description:
Alignment for the field’s contents.
This key is not allowed for primary fields or back fields.

ignoresTimeZone.title: Ignores Time Zone
ignoresTimeZone.description:
Always display the time and date in the given time zone, not in the user’s current time zone.
The format for a date and time always requires a time zone, even if it will be ignored. For backward compatibility with iOS 6, provide an appropriate time zone, so that the information is displayed meaningfully even without ignoring time zones.
This key does not affect how relevance is calculated.
Available in iOS 7.0.

isRelative.title: Is Relative
isRelative.description:
If true, the label’s value is displayed as a relative date; otherwise, it is displayed as an absolute date.
This key does not affect how relevance is calculated.

numberStyle.title: Number Style
numberStyle.description: Style of number to display. Number styles have the same meaning as the Cocoa number formatter styles with corresponding names. See https://developer.apple.com/documentation/foundation/nsnumberformatterstyle

semantics.title: Semantics
semantics.description: Machine-readable metadata to allow the system to offer Wallet passes to users intelligently.
semantics.$comment: All semantic data is optional and different semantic fields can be placed in auxiliary, primary, secondary, header or back fields.

totalPrice.title: Total Price
totalPrice.description: The total price for the pass.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the event or transit journey, in seconds.

seats.title: Seats
seats.description: Seating details for all seats at the event or transit journey.

silenceRequested.title: Silence Requested
silenceRequested.description: Request the user's device to remain silent during a the event or transit journey. This key may not be honored and the system will determine the length of the silence period.

departureLocation.title: Departure Location
departureLocation.description: The geographic coordinates of the transit departure, suitable to be shown on a map. If possible, precise locations are more useful to travelers, such as the specific location of the gate at an airport.

departureLocationDescription.title: Departure Location Description
departureLocationDescription.description: A brief description of the departure location.

destinationLocation.title: Destination Location
destinationLocation.description: The geographic coordinates of the transit destination, suitable to be shown on a map.

destinationLocationDescription.title: Destination Location Description
destinationLocationDescription.description: A brief description of the destination location.

transitProvider.title: Transit Provider
transitProvider.description: The name of the transit company.

vehicleName.title: Vehicle Name
vehicleName.description: The name of the vehicle being boarded, such as the name of a boat.

vehicleNumber.title: Vehicle Number
vehicleNumber.description: The identifier of the vehicle being boarded, such as the aircraft registration number or train number.

vehicleType.title: Vehicle Type
vehicleType.description: A brief description of the type of vehicle being boarded, such as the model and manufacturer of a plane or the class of a boat.

originalDepartureDate.title: Original Departure Date
originalDepartureDate.description: The original scheduled date and time of departure.

currentDepartureDate.title: Current Departure Date
currentDepartureDate.description: The updated date and time of departure, if different than the original scheduled date.

originalArrivalDate.title: Original Arrival Date
originalArrivalDate.description: The original scheduled date and time of arrival.

currentArrivalDate.title: Current Arrival Date
currentArrivalDate.description: The updated date and time of arrival, if different than the original scheduled date.

originalBoardingDate.title: Original Boarding Date
originalBoardingDate.description: The original scheduled date and time of boarding.

currentBoardingDate.title: Current Boarding Date
currentBoardingDate.description: The updated date and time of boarding, if different than the original scheduled date.

confirmationNumber.title: Confirmation Number
confirmationNumber.description: A booking or reservation confirmation number.

transitStatus.title: Transit Status
transitStatus.description: A brief description of the current status of the vessel being boarded. For delayed statuses, provide currentBoardingDate, currentDepartureDate, and currentArrivalDate where available.

transitStatusReason.title: Transit Status Reason
transitStatusReason.description: A brief description explaining the reason for the current transitStatus

membershipProgramName.title: Membership Program Name
membershipProgramName.description: The name of a frequent flyer or loyalty program.

membershipProgramNumber.title: Membership Program Number
membershipProgramNumber.description: The ticketed passenger's frequent flyer or loyalty number.

priorityStatus.title: Priority Status
priorityStatus.description: he priority status held by the ticketed passenger

securityScreening.title: Security Screening
securityScreening.description: The type of security screening that the ticketed passenger will be subject to, such as 'Priority'.

airlineCode.title: The IATA airline code
airlineCode.description: The IATA airline code, such as 'EX' for flightCode 'EX123'.

flightNumber.title: Flight Number
flightNumber.description: The numeric portion of the IATA flightCode, such as 123 for flightCode 'EX123'

departureAirportCode.title: Departure Airport Code
departureAirportCode.description: The IATA airport code for the departure airport.

departureAirportName.title: Departure Airport Name
departureAirportName.description: The full name of the departure airport

departureTerminal.title: Departure Terminal
departureTerminal.description: The terminal name or letter of the departure terminal, such as 'A'. Do not include the word 'Terminal'

departureGate.title: Departure Gate
departureGate.description: The gate number or letters of the departure gate, such as '1A'. Do not include the word 'Gate'.

destinationAirportCode.title: Destination Airport Code
destinationAirportCode.description: The IATA airport code for the destination airport.

destinationAirportName.title: Destination Airport Name
destinationAirportName.description: The full name of the destination airport

destinationTerminal.title: Destination Terminal
destinationTerminal.description: The terminal name or letter of the destination terminal, such as 'A'. Do not include the word 'Terminal'

destinationGate.title: Destination Gate
destinationGate.description: The gate number or letters of the destination gate, such as '1A'. Do not include the word 'Gate'.

departurePlatform.title: Departure Platform
departurePlatform.description: The name of the departure platform, such as 'A'. Do not include the word 'Platform'.

departureStationName.title: Departure Station Name
departureStationName.description: The name of the departure station.

destinationPlatform.title: Destination Platform
destinationPlatform.description: The name of the destination platform, such as 'A'. Do not include the word 'Platform'.

destinationStationName.title: Destination Station Name
destinationStationName.description: The name of the destination station.

eventName.title: Event Name
eventName.description: The full name for the event, such as the title of a movie.

venueName.title: Venue Name
venueName.description: The full name of the venue.

venueLocation.title: Venue Location
venueLocation.description: The geographic coordinates of the venue.

venueEntrance.title: Venue Entrance
venueEntrance.description: The full name of the entrance to use to gain access to the ticketed event.

venuePhoneNumber.title: Venue Phone Number
venuePhoneNumber.description: The phone number for enquiries about the venue's ticketed event.

venueRoom.title: Venue Room
venueRoom.description: The full name of the room where the ticketed event is taking place.

eventStartDate.title: Event Start Date
eventStartDate.description: The date and time the event starts.

eventEndDate.title: Event End Date
eventEndDate.description: The date and time the event ends.

artistIDs.title: Artist IDs
artistIDs.description: The Adam IDs for the artists performing, in decreasing order of significance.

performerNames.title: Performer Names
performerNames.description: The full names of the performers and opening acts, in decreasing order of significance.

leagueName.title: League Name
leagueName.description: he unabbreviated league name for a sporting event.

leagueAbbreviation.title: League Abbreviation
leagueAbbreviation.description: The abbreviated league name for a sporting event.

homeTeamLocation.title: Home Team Location
homeTeamLocation.description: The home location of the home team.

homeTeamName.title: Home Team Name
homeTeamName.description: The name of the home team.

homeTeamAbbreviation.title: Home Team Abbreviation
homeTeamAbbreviation.description: The unique abbreviation of the home team's name.

awayTeamLocation.title: Away Team Location
awayTeamLocation.description: The home location of the away team.

awayTeamName.title: Away Team Name
awayTeamName.description: The name of the away team.

awayTeamAbbreviation.title: Away Team Abbreviation
awayTeamAbbreviation.description: The unique abbreviation of the away team's name.

sportName.title: Sport Name
sportName.description: The commonly used local name of the sport.

balance.title: Balance
balance.description: The balance redeemable with the pass.

major.title: Major
major.description: Major identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy location beacon.

minor.title: Minor
minor.description: Minor identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy location beacon.

proximityUUID.title: Proximity UUID
proximityUUID.description: Unique identifier of a Bluetooth Low Energy location beacon.

relevantText.title: Relevant Text
relevantText.description: Text displayed on the lock screen when the pass is currently relevant.

altitude.title: Altitude
altitude.description: Altitude, in meters, of the location.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude, in degrees, of the location.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude, in degrees, of the location.

relevantText.title: Relevant Text
relevantText.description: Text displayed on the lock screen when the pass is currently relevant.

passStructure.title: Pass Structure
passStructure.description:
Keys that define the structure of the pass.
These keys are used for all pass styles and partition the fields into the various parts of the pass.

auxiliaryFields.title: Auxiliary Fields
auxiliaryFields.description: Additional fields to be displayed on the front of the pass.

backFields.title: Back Fields
backFields.description: Fields to be on the back of the pass.

headerFields.title: Header Fields
headerFields.description: Fields to be displayed in the header on the front of the pass.Use header fields sparingly; unlike all other fields, they remain visible when a stack of passes are displayed.

primaryFields.title: Primary Fields
primaryFields.description: Fields to be displayed prominently on the front of the pass.

secondaryFields.title: Secondary Fields
secondaryFields.description: Fields to be displayed on the front of the pass.

altText.title: Alternative Text
altText.description: Text displayed near the barcode. For example, a human-readable version of the barcode data in case the barcode doesn’t scan.

format.title: Format
format.description: Barcode format. PKBarcodeFormatCode128 may only be used for dictionaries in the barcodes array.

message.title: Message
message.description: Message or payload to be displayed as a barcode.

messageEncoding.title: Message Encoding
messageEncoding.description: Text encoding that is used to convert the message from the string representation to a data representation to render the barcode. The value is typically iso-8859-1, but you may use another encoding that is supported by your barcode scanning infrastructure.

nfc.title: NFC
nfc.description: Information about the NFC payload passed to an Apple Pay terminal.

message.title: Message
message.description: The payload to be transmitted to the Apple Pay terminal. Must be 64 bytes or less. Messages longer than 64 bytes are truncated by the system.

encryptionPublicKey.title: Encryption Public Key
encryptionPublicKey.description: The public encryption key used by the Value Added Services protocol. Use a Base64 encoded X.509 SubjectPublicKeyInfo structure containing a ECDH public key for group P256.

description.title: Description
description.description:
Brief description of the pass, used by the iOS accessibility technologies.
Don’t try to include all of the data on the pass in its description, just include enough detail to distinguish passes of the same type.
 Localizable.

organizationName.title: Organization Name
organizationName.description:
Display name of the organization that originated and signed the pass.
 Localizable.

passTypeIdentifier.title: Pass Type Identifier
passTypeIdentifier.description: Pass type identifier, as issued by Apple. The value must correspond with your signing certificate.

serialNumber.title: Serial Number
serialNumber.description: Serial number that uniquely identifies the pass. No two passes with the same pass type identifier may have the same serial number.

teamIdentifier.title: Team Identifier
teamIdentifier.description: Team identifier of the organization that originated and signed the pass, as issued by Apple.

appLaunchURL.title: App Launch URL
appLaunchURL.description: A URL to be passed to the associated app when launching it. The app receives this URL in the application:didFinishLaunchingWithOptions: and application:openURL:options: methods of its app delegate.

associatedStoreIdentifiers.title: Associated Store Identifiers
associatedStoreIdentifiers.description:
A list of iTunes Store item identifiers for the associated apps.
Only one item in the list is used—the first item identifier for an app compatible with the current device. If the app is not installed, the link opens the App Store and shows the app. If the app is already installed, the link launches the app.

userInfo.title: User Info
userInfo.description:
Custom information for companion apps. This data is not displayed to the user.
For example, a pass for a cafe could include information about the user’s favorite drink and sandwich in a machine-readable form for the companion app to read, making it easy to place an order for “the usual” from the app.
Available in iOS 7.0.

expirationDate.title: Expiration Date
expirationDate.description:
Date and time when the pass expires.
Available in iOS 7.0.

voided.title: Voided
voided.description:
Indicates that the pass is void—for example, a one time use coupon that has been redeemed.
Available in iOS 7.0.

beacons.title: Beacons
beacons.description:
Beacons marking locations where the pass is relevant.
Available in iOS 7.0.

locations.title: Locations
locations.description: Locations where the pass is relevant. For example, the location of your store.

maxDistance.title: Maximum Distance
maxDistance.description:
Maximum distance in meters from a relevant latitude and longitude that the pass is relevant. This number is compared to the pass’s default distance and the smaller value is used.
Available in iOS 7.0.

relevantDate.title: Relevant Date
relevantDate.description:
Date and time when the pass becomes relevant. For example, the start time of a movie.
Recommended for event tickets and boarding passes.

boardingPass.title: Boarding Pass
boardingPass.description: Information specific to a boarding pass.

eventTicket.title: Event Ticket
eventTicket.description: Information specific to an event ticket.

generic.title: Generic Pass
generic.description: Information specific to a generic pass.

storeCard.title: Store Card
storeCard.description: Information specific to a store card.

barcode.title: Barcode
barcode.description:
Information specific to the pass’s barcode.
Deprecated in iOS 9.0 and later; use barcodes instead.

barcodes.title: Barcodes
barcodes.description:
Information specific to the pass’s barcode. The system uses the first valid barcode dictionary in the array. Additional dictionaries can be added as fallbacks.
Available only in iOS 9.0 and later.

backgroundColor.title: Background Color
backgroundColor.description: Background color of the pass, specified as an CSS-style RGB triple.

foregroundColor.title: Foreground Color
foregroundColor.description: Foreground color of the pass, specified as a CSS-style RGB triple

groupingIdentifier.title: Grouping Identifier
groupingIdentifier.description:
Identifier used to group related passes. If a grouping identifier is specified, passes with the same style, pass type identifier, and grouping identifier are displayed as a group. Otherwise, passes are grouped automatically.
Use this to group passes that are tightly related, such as the boarding passes for different connections of the same trip.
Available in iOS 7.0.

labelColor.title: Label Color
labelColor.description:
olor of the label text, specified as a CSS-style RGB triple.
If omitted, the label color is determined automatically.

logoText.title: Logo Text
logoText.description:
Text displayed next to the logo on the pass.
Localizable.

suppressStripShine.title: Suppress Strip Shine
suppressStripShine.description: If true, the strip image is displayed without a shine effect. The default value prior to iOS 7.0 is false. In iOS 7.0, a shine effect is never applied, and this key is deprecated.

authenticationToken.title: Authentication Token
authenticationToken.description: The authentication token to use with the web service.

webServiceURL.title: Web Service URL
webServiceURL.description: The URL of a web service that conforms to the API described in PassKit Web Service Reference. The web service must use the HTTPS protocol; the leading https:// is included in the value of this key. On devices configured for development, there is UI in Settings to allow HTTP web services.

nfc.title: NFC
nfc.description:
Information used for Value Added Service Protocol transactions.
Available in iOS 9.0.
